data.eml:eml: Eviota nigrispina, a New Goby from the Ryukyu Islands, Japan (Teleostei: Gobiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Greenfield, David W., Suzuki, Toshiyuki (2010): Eviota nigrispina, a New Goby from the Ryukyu Islands, Japan (Teleostei: Gobiidae). Zootaxa 2655: 57-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.276213
